original_title: 人妻隷奴 背徳のフィギュア
overview: A young wife who was targeted! Horror of Eros. Deep in the heart of the young wife, who has a strong aversion to sex, there was a desire to become a man's slave to submit and be dominated by the body. This work depicts the immorality and climax of a young wife who is trained deep into the body by a stalker who targets a young wife and a psychiatrist who controls the stalker.
title: Married Slave Immoral Figure
